item.description:
We are donating our half of the profits to Promising Hope Animal Sanctuary in Massachusetts

http://www.promisinghope.com/default.html
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be the ones with the good stuff for sale!
item.why:
see the link: http://www.veganbakesale.org/veganbakesale/index.html We need lots of volunteers to bake. Come join us!
We will be set up in the hallway outside the Vegan May Brunch hosted by Like No Udder.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: World Vegan Bake Sale bake sale / joint event with RI VegOut
